Lower Tabs
**********

Notes
=====

Take notes on a sample and keep them with the files.  The notes are automatically saved as the user types.  The saved file is stored in the same directory as the sample file.

Filters
=======

User defined filters are shown in the *Filter Table*.  Edit filters, turn them on/off, change boolean operations, and remove them directly from the table.

Profiles
========

Profile plots are displayed in the *Profiles* tab.
